listitem.para: Use Session Timeout to set the period of inactivity before a user is logged out of the console.

Use Mode to set the type of authentication. Choose from Database (using the VMDB), LDAP (Lightweight Directory Authentication Protocol), LDAPS (Secure Lightweight Directory Authentication Protocol), or Amazon. The default is Database. If you choose Database, see to create users. See for more information on configuration for LDAP and LDAPS. If you choose Amazon, see .
